title: DroidSet Free v1.13 Installer
description:
DROIDSET FREE v1.13



DroidSet allows you to manage settings on Android phones by providing quick toggling functionality. These functionality allow you to enable or disable Wi-Fi, Mobile network, GPS, Bluetooth, Screen orientation, Flight mode and much more at a touch of a button. When the functionality is activated, you will be presented with some information regarding that functionality.

You can install the APK found in this torrent (See instructions below) or install it from https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=au.com.ckd.droidsetfree&hl=en.


-----------
Changelog:
-----------
v1.13:
a. Update Preferences.
b. Update screen layouts.
c. Bug fixes.
- Fix app's locale not defaulting to newly selected system locale.
- Fix some functions not displaying status messages after a locale change.
- Fix boot receiver not working for HTC devices.
- Fix errors with network and Wi-Fi functions.
Note: Unless there's a critical bug, this is the last DroidSet release for Stage 1. DroidSet will continue in Stage 2 with profiling, logging, more functional customisation, etc.


--------------------------
Prerequisite requirement:
--------------------------
1. An unrooted or rooted Android phone. Note: Some features might not work if you don't have a rooted phone.
2. Android 2.1 (Eclair) and up.


--------------------------
Steps to install the APK:
--------------------------

1. On Android 2.x.x, go to Settings | Applications and tick Unknown Sources.

On Android 3.x.x, go to Settings | Applications and tick Unknown Sources.

On Android 4.x.x, go to Settings | Security and tick Unknown Sources.


2. Copy the APK onto phone's internal SD card using a Wifi program or directly via the phone's USB connection.


3. Use a file manager like (Astro File Manager, Root Explorer, etc) to browse to location of saved APK.


4. Tap on APK to install.


Enjoy.
